mapper.select: select o.order_id,o.order_state_id,o.order_amount,o.member_id,(select m.member_name from `member` m where o.member_id=m.member_id) as member_name, o.order_name, o.order_phone, o.order_date from `order` o order by o.order_id desc;

SELECT o.order_id, o.member_id, o.order_date, o.order_phone, o.order_tel, o.order_name, o.order_msg, o.order_addr1, o.order_addr2, o.order_addr3, o.order_amount, (SELECT m.member_name from `member` m where o.member_id=m.member_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as member_name, (SELECT m.member_phone from `member` m where o.member_id=m.member_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as member_phone, (SELECT m.member_email from `member` m where o.member_id=m.member_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as member_email, (SELECT o_s.order_state_admin from `order_state`o_s, `order` o where o.order_state_id=o_s.order_state_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as order_state_admin, (SELECT d.delivery_company from `delivery` d where o.order_id=d.order_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as delivery_company, (SELECT d.delivery_number from `delivery` d where o.order_id=d.order_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as delivery_number, (SELECT d_s.delivery_state_name from `delivery_state` d_s, `delivery` d where d_s.delivery_state_id=d.delivery_state_id and o.order_id=d.order_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as delivery_state_name, (SELECT p.payment_date from `payment` p where p.order_id=o.order_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as payment_date, (SELECT p.payment_amount from `payment` p where p.order_id=o.order_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as payment_amount, (SELECT p_s.payment_state_name from `payment_state` p_s, `payment` p where p_s.payment_state_id=p.payment_state_id and p.order_id=#{value}) as payment_state_name from `order` o where o.order_id=#{value};

select o_d.order_detail_id, o_d.order_id, o_d.product_id, o_d.order_detail_price, o_d.order_detail_quantity, o_d.order_detail_option, (select p.product_name from `product` p where o_d.product_id=p.product_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as product_name, (select p.product_price from `product` p where o_d.product_id=p.product_id and o.order_id=#{value}) as product_price from `order_detail` o_d, `order` o where o_d.order_id=o.order_id and o.order_id=#{value};
